lines.content: * NyanBot is a simple task management CLI app
* Users can store different task types with varying descriptions and time-related info
* Users can view, remove, add and find tasks
* Data is stored automatically in ./data/nyan.txt file

* Stores collection of tasks and methods for manipulation of task list.

* First token corresponds to task type and is capitalised for processCommand
* Second token stores other information ie task status, description, date etc

* Handles file IO operations for NyanBot class
* reads data in ./data/nyan.txt and converts data into arraylist of tasks

* writes arraylist of tasks into .txt file
* creates new .txt file in ./data/ if non-existent

* @param line string containing information for task
* @return task object with data converted from string input
